attributes.action: To draw the  attention of Imo State & Federal govt. to Oka community roads
attributes.additional_details: The people of the area cannot transport their farm produce to the urban market as a result of lack of access roads, students are  being sent out of school because their parents cannot not sell their farm produce to support their children at school. If this community can have at least one the roads tired/paved,it can go a long way in alleviating the sufferings which Oka people in Isiala Mbano go through, especially during the rains.
attributes.background: Oka Arutumibe community  in Isiala Mbano Local Government Area, in Imo State Nigeria is one of few rural communities in Imo state that has no access road leading to the area. The people of the area lack every basic infrastructure such as health care, school, water etc., and completely cut off .
